title: Guess what ability I'm talking about.
body:
My range varies, but I'm often 500+ and occasionally 700+.
I require literally no resources.
My cooldown generally ends up at around one second, but building appropriately can get it down to .4 seconds.
I'm targeted and give no counterplay unless you're playing one of a good two champions.
Likewise, I'm one of the few abilities in the game to be able to target towers.
What ability am I?
